name: 古碧源
objective:
線性電路；電算放大器；二極體；非線性電路應用；接面場
效電晶體（JFET）；金屬氧化物半導體場效電晶體 (MOSFET)
；雙極性接面電晶體（BJT）；差動放大器；多級放大器。金
氧半電晶體；雙接面電晶體；差動及多極放大器；功率放大
器；頻率響應；回授；類比積體電路；濾波器；調諧放大器
；振盪器。
schedule:
1 (2/20,21): Biasing
2 (2/27,28): 2/27 Discrete-circuit amplifiers; 2/28 National Holiday; 
3 (3/5,6): IC biasing
4 (3/12,13): Basic gain cell and CG/CB amplifiers
5 (3/19,20): 3/19 CD/CC amplifier; 3/20 School Sports Day
6 (3/26,27): Transistor pairings
7 (4/2,3): multi-stage amplifeirs
8 (4/9,10): MOS differential amplifiers
9 (4/16,17): 4/16 differential amplifiers; 4/17 mid-term exam
10 (4/23,24): Low-frequency response
11 (4/30,5/1): High-frequency response
12 (5/7,8): Basics of feedback
13 (5/14,15): Feedback voltage amplifiers
14 (5/21,22): Other feedback amplifier types
15 (5/28,29): Basics of output stages
16 (6/4,5): Class A and Class B amplifiers
17 (6/11,12): Class AB amplifiers
18 (6/19): Final exam
scorePolicy:
期中考試：40-50%
期中考試：40-50% (期中考試 + 期中考試成績共 90%)
平時與出勤考核：10%
materials: Microelectronic Circuits, International 8th Ed, Adel Sedra, Kenneth Smith, Tony Chan Carusone, & Vincent Gaudet, Oxford University Press, 2021.
consultation: 上課提問；Office Hours 個別諮詢，必要時由助教進一步輔導。
remarks: 因應疫情防疫規定，若學校宣布調整教學方式為遠距教學，則採用 Google Meet 遠距教學。各次考試也採遠距考試，教師用 Google Meet 螢幕分享考題，並將電子檔傳送至上課班級群組。考試開始後老師在 Google Meet 逐一唱名點名，時間到學生必須在限定時間內以 email 寄交答案。
